column2: The two Petitioner-Appellants (hereinafter sometimes referred to as the Petitioners)
who filed the instant Writ Petition in the Court of Appeal are two of the Trustees of

column1: German Dharmaduta Society. Although the Petitioners in their Petition have admitted

column2: the existence of three other Trustees, the Petitioners have stated that the other three
Trustees  are  abroad.  Therefore,  the  Petitioners  have  stated  that  they  are  the  only
Trustees of said German Dharmaduta Society remaining at present in Sri Lanka. They
